localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.body: The Netherlands implemented these  laws 2 weeks ago. You now have to screenshot your wallet when withdrawing bitcoin from Dutch exchanges, easy but annoying. Make sure you vote people in power that protect property rights and bitcoin, and remove people who don't protect freedom. https://t.co/BCcogxS8IE
blogPost.title: The Netherlands implemented these  laws 2 weeks ago. You now have to screenshot your wallet when withdrawing bitcoin from Dutch exchanges, easy but annoying. Make sure you vote people in power that protect property rights and bitcoin, and remove people who don't protect freedom. https://t.co/BCcogxS8IE
blogPost.author: PlanB

sharedContent.title: Last week we heard rumors that the U.S. Treasury and Secretary Mnuchin were planning to rush out some new regulation regarding self-hosted crypto wallets before the end of his term. I'm concerned that this would have unintended side effects, and wanted to share those concerns.
sharedContent.author: Brian Armstrong

localize.full_text: 荷兰在两周前实施了这些法律。现在从荷兰交易所提取比特币时，你必须截取钱包的屏幕，这很容易，但很烦人。确保投票给保护财产权和比特币的当权者，驱逐不保护自由的人。https://t.co/BCcogxS8IE
localize.quoted_status_full_text: 上周，我们听到传言称，美国财政部和姆努钦部长计划在他的任期结束前匆忙出台一些关于自托管密码钱包的新规定。我担心这会产生意想不到的副作用，并想分享这些担忧。

localize.full_text: 荷蘭在兩週前實施了這些法律。現在從荷蘭交易所提取比特幣時，你必須截取錢包的屏幕，這很容易，但很煩人。確保投票給保護財產權和比特幣的當權者，驅逐不保護自由的人。https://t.co/BCcogxS8IE
localize.quoted_status_full_text: 上週，我們聽到傳言稱，美國財政部和姆努欽部長計劃在他的任期結束前匆忙出臺一些關於自託管密碼錢包的新規定。我擔心這會產生意想不到的副作用，並想分享這些擔憂。

previous.title: Tomorrow is Monday! Paypal, Grayscale, Square etc will resume buying #bitcoin. Are you ready? https://t.co/kGx2g1pphF

localize.full_text: 明天是星期一！贝宝(PayPal)、灰度(Grayscale)、Square等将恢复购买#比特币。准备好了吗？https://t.co/kGx2g1pphF
明天是星期一！貝寶(PayPal)、灰度(Grayscale)、Square等將恢復購買#比特幣。準備好了嗎？https://t.co/kGx2g1pphF

next.title: Thank you Vortex for all you did for us. 🙏 Good luck with your new adventures!! I will keep following you😎 https://t.co/cE0WqksWpW

localize.full_text: 谢谢Vortex为我们所做的一切。🙏祝你的新冒险好运！！我会一直跟着你的https://t.co/cE0WqksWpW😎
localize.quoted_status_full_text:
1/公告：我现在把大部分时间都花在我的新音乐项目上了

在连续两年多的时间里，我每天都在CoinDesk评论上评论比特币

在那之后的5年多时间里，我每天都在推特和RT上谈论比特币

我做这一切都没有想过奖励/补偿。

localize.full_text: 謝謝Vortex爲我們所做的一切。🙏祝你的新冒險好運！！我會一直跟着你的https://t.co/cE0WqksWpW😎
localize.quoted_status_full_text:
1/公告：我現在把大部分時間都花在我的新音樂項目上了

在連續兩年多的時間裏，我每天都在CoinDesk評論上評論比特幣

在那之後的5年多時間裏，我每天都在推特和RT上談論比特幣

我做這一切都沒有想過獎勵/補償。
